title: Kai'Sa is Worth 7800 BE?
body: So we all know that Kai'Sa is op and now that she's out everyone wants to try her out... but did Riot have to make her worth 7800 BE (975 RP)? For People who have a hard time leveling and don't pay in League... this seems a little much for this character... but I'm probably overreacting. Any other thoughts on her price?

replies.body:
your probably new so therefore didn't know, but for the first week any new champ is released they are priced at 7800 BE

after that they get reduced to plain 6300.

>So we all know that Kai'Sa is op

Wrong, she's actually underpowered atm, only reason she might be doing good day 1 is people's lack of understanding how she works. Even then, she is weak (going off of good players using her on the PBE)

>but did Riot have to make her worth 7800 BE (975 RP)?

Every new champion starts off at 7800 then drops to 6300 after a week. Don't overreact over nothing.
Riot gotta pad their %%%%% wallets so yeah.

its always like this though. for EVERY champ. I don't understand how its greeding considering this has been a thing since forever. let alone the fact that they make no money off of a free-to-earn currency.

She's new and new champs are pretty much always OP so riot can cash in on the RP purchases. From an anti pay-to-win perspective, she's OP in both senses (OP and Over Priced). From Riot's owners perspective, she's perfectly priced

She's currently sitting at a 41 percent winrate.  You are statistically more likely to lose with one on your team, and that winrate is aligned with one of the most powerful roles in the game currently - ADC.  If you pick her, your team's chances to lose currently are greatly increased.
